ItemType.name: ion drive
ItemType.description: This drive was designed with efficiency prioritized over speed. It utilizes an electric field to accelerate ionized particles to near light speeds to get the most thrust out of its fuel. Increases max speed to 0.16c.

ItemType.name: plasma drive
ItemType.description: This efficient drive was designed to reduce travel costs for freighters. It utilizes a magnetic field to induce density waves in a plasma that accelerates the reaction mass to high velocities. Increases max speed to 0.18c.

ItemType.name: tritium propulsion upgrade
ItemType.description: Most small and medium sized ships use a fusion drive for propulsion. This device upgrade mixes-in a powerful tritium plasma to increase the thrust of the engines. Increases max speed to 0.20c.

ItemType.name: tritium drive
ItemType.description: This drive was specifically designed from the ground up to utilize a powerful tritium-plasma mix for propulsion. Increases max speed to 0.22c.

ItemType.name: chronimium propulsion upgrade
ItemType.description: Most small and medium sized ships use a fusion drive for propulsion. This device upgrade mixes-in a powerful chronimium plasma to greatly increase the thrust of the engines. Increases max speed to 0.23c.

ItemType.name: chronimium drive
ItemType.description: This drive was specifically designed from the ground up to utilize a powerful chronimium-plasma mix for propulsion. Increases max speed to 0.25c.

ItemType.name: cobalt-thorium megadrive
ItemType.description: The cobalt-thorium megadrive is an old military starship engine. Like most other military technology, megadrives cannot be used by civilian ships. Increases max speed to 0.27c.

ItemType.name: xenotite megadrive
ItemType.description: The xenotite megadrive is a reliable military starship engine. Like most other military technology, megadrives cannot be used by civilian ships. Increases max speed to 0.28c.

ItemType.name: pteracnium megadrive
ItemType.description: The pteracnium megadrive is a recently developed military starship engine. Like most other military technology, megadrives cannot be used by civilian ships. Increases max speed to 0.30c.

ItemType.name: zero-point propulsion upgrade
ItemType.description: This alien device upgrade utilizes powerful zero-point crystals to greatly increase the thrust of engines in both regular drives and megadrives. Increases max speed to 0.32c.

ItemType.name: zero-point megadrive
ItemType.description: This alien megadrive appears to have been designed from the ground up to utilize powerful zero-point crystals to amplify its propulsion. Increases max speed to 0.33c.

ItemType.name: impulse drive
ItemType.description: This alien stardrive appears to utilize an array of built in Bussard collectors to produce enough reaction mass to achieve speeds further approaching that of light. Increases max speed to 0.35c.

ItemType.name: auxiliary ion drive
ItemType.description: This drive provides a maximum velocity of 0.16c and has been modified such that it can be installed to the exterior of a ship. Can be further modified with the included Cabbage Corp Toolset to increase thrust by forgoing containment.

ItemType.name: auxiliary plasma drive
ItemType.description: This drive provides a maximum velocity of 0.18c and has been modified such that it can be installed to the exterior of a ship. Can be further modified with the included Cabbage Corp Toolset to increase thrust by forgoing containment.

ItemType.name: unshielded ion drive
ItemType.description: This auxiliary drive provides a maximum velocity of 0.17c and has been modified to increase thrust by running without containment. Can be freely modified with the included Cabbage Corp Toolset to restore containment and increase fuel efficiency.
